sn45.42-47:2.1: 5 Abbreviated Texts on Followers of Other Paths
sn45.42-47:3.1: 42–47 Six Discourses on Giving Up Fetters, etc.
sn45.42-47:4.1: “Mendicants, if wanderers who follow another path were to ask you:
sn45.42-47:4.2: ‘Reverends, what’s the purpose of living the spiritual life with the ascetic Gotama?’ You should answer them like this.
sn45.42-47:4.3: ‘The purpose of living the spiritual life under the Buddha is to give up the fetters.’ …
sn45.42-47:4.5: ‘… to completely understand the course of time.’ …
sn45.42-47:4.7: ‘… to realize the fruit of knowledge and freedom.’ …
